A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It seemed like 75% of the movie was just filler with no real consequence to the ultimate outcome to the movie. Finn and Poe are regulated to non-essential characters\, while the only redeeming scenes were with Luke and Ray. Kylo Ren is not the quintessential villain that Vader was\, while Snoke is and always will remain a mystery. The Leia in space scene was mind-boggling ridiculous. This movie killed any anticipation for episode 9. I just don't care.
